hero.title: Contact Us
hero.subtitle: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.

form.title: Send us a Message
form.subtitle: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.

general.question: General Questions
general.answer: Find answers to common questions about SkillBridge, our mentors, and how to get started.

technical.question: Technical Support
technical.answer: Having technical issues? Check our help center or contact our technical support team.

billing.question: Billing & Payments
billing.answer: Questions about payments, refunds, or billing? We're here to help with all financial inquiries.

account.question: Account Management
account.answer: Need help with your account settings, profile, or security? We'll guide you through it.

support.title: Need Immediate Help?
support.description: Our support team is available 24/7 to assist you with any urgent questions or issues.
